nodes.bodyText: Can we return the specific type here?
What is the difference between taskName and name? Which does fullyQualifiedName refer to? How can we rename these variables to make that self-revealing?

+

+public class TaskMetaData extends AlertSerializableModel {

nodes.bodyText: If you end up renaming these in Java, don't forget to rename them here.
